cards.name: King of Hearts
cards.description: The King of Hearts is often referred to as the 'suicide king' because he appears to be sticking his sword into his head. However, this is a misinterpretation of the original design. In decks of playing cards, the King of Hearts represents a royal figure with a sword behind his head, giving him a unique appearance.

cards.name: Queen of Spades
cards.description: The Queen of Spades is known as one of the most powerful and mysterious cards in a deck. She is often associated with secrets, hidden knowledge, and a strong, independent character. In card games, the Queen of Spades can be a formidable card to play or encounter.

cards.name: Jack of Diamonds
cards.description: The Jack of Diamonds is a youthful and energetic card. He is often depicted as a cheerful, mischievous figure, ready to take on any challenge. In some games, the Jack of Diamonds may hold special significance, like being the highest trump card.

cards.name: Ace of Clubs
cards.description: The Ace of Clubs is the highest-ranking card in the club suit. It symbolizes unity, power, and mastery. In many games, the Ace of Clubs can be a winning card or a wild card that can be used strategically to gain an advantage.

cards.name: 10 of Spades
cards.description: The 10 of Spades is often considered a card of change and transformation. It represents the end of a cycle and the beginning of something new. In card games, the 10 of Spades can sometimes have special effects, like skipping turns or causing reversals.
